events.name: Festival Kick off
events.description: Free T-Shirts for the first 50 people.

events.name: Amazing Race
events.location: Kicks off in the elementry school parking lot.
events.description: Race around the town in golf carts looking for clues

events.name: 3 on 3 Basketball tournament
events.description: All ages Men's and Women's brackets. Send forms to events@fireballfestival.com

events.name: Fish Fry
events.description: Fundraiser for the church, $5 suggested donation.

events.name: Comode Races
events.location: 100 N Main St. Crescent City, IL
events.description: Compete for the title of fasted comode in crescent city! Bring your cart and team, be ready to run! submit your registration forms to events@fireballfestival.com.

events.name: Beer Tent opens
events.description: Signup for an hour long shift working the taps, we'll show the name of your organization on the projector. Min 6 people required.

events.name: Last Call
events.description: Last call for beer, music stops at 12:30am

events.name: Fish Fry
events.description: Fundraiser for the church, $5 suggested donation.

events.name: Closing Ceremonies
events.description: The planning commity will send us off, until next time.
